import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import XTermTerminal from'../components/xterm.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TerminalPage=()=>{const appRef=useRef(null);const mousePosition=useRef({x:50,y:50});// Initialize to center
useEffect(()=>{// Add mouse move event listener to track cursor position for gradient
const handleMouseMove=e=>{if(appRef.current){const rect=appRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();mousePosition.current={x:(e.clientX-rect.left)/rect.width*100,y:(e.clientY-rect.top)/rect.height*100};// Update gradient position
appRef.current.style.setProperty('--mouse-x',"".concat(mousePosition.current.x,"%"));appRef.current.style.setProperty('--mouse-y',"".concat(mousePosition.current.y,"%"));}};if(appRef.current){appRef.current.addEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);// Initialize with center position
appRef.current.style.setProperty('--mouse-x','50%');appRef.current.style.setProperty('--mouse-y','50%');}return()=>{if(appRef.current){appRef.current.removeEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);}};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:appRef,className:"text-center",style:{minHeight:'100vh',background:'radial-gradient(circle, #0a0a0a 0%, #000000 100%)',color:'#00ff00',fontFamily:"'Courier New', monospace",padding:'20px',boxSizing:'border-box',width:'100%',position:'relative',overflow:'hidden'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,right:0,bottom:0,backgroundImage:"\n          linear-gradient(rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px),\n          linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px)\n        ",backgroundSize:'50px 50px',zIndex:0}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:'900px',margin:'0 auto',position:'relative',zIndex:2,height:'calc(100vh - 40px)',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'flex-start'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontSize:'2rem',marginBottom:'20px',fontWeight:'bold',color:'#00ff00',textShadow:'0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.7)',letterSpacing:'1px',textAlign:'center',zIndex:2},children:"TERMINAL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XTermTerminal,{})]})]});};export default TerminalPage;
